titleStmt.title: An answer to the Provinciall letters published by the Jansenists, under the name of Lewis Montalt, against the doctrine of the Jesuits and school-divines made by some Fathers of the Society in France.
Responses aux Lettres provinciales publiées par le secrétaire de Port-Royal contre les PP. de la Compagnie de Jésus, sur le sujet de la morale des dits Pères. English.
titleStmt.author: Nouet, Jacques, 1605-1680.

notesStmt.note: "There is set before the answers in this edition, The history of Jansenisme, and at the end, a Conclusion of the work, where the English Additionalls are shewed to deserve no answer ; also an Appendix, shewing the same of the book called, A further discovery of Jesuitisme"
Written by Jacques Nouet, Francois Annat, and others. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
